James Coleman (he/him)


We are 3 students at Pratt Institute - School Information. We also go by Team Morpheus. James and Nene are both graduate students within the MSLIS Program, while Nikhil is a graduate student within the IxD Program. We all have an interest in the development of Generative AI, the way we interact with it, and how it is affecting the library space.
